page.title: 14Parish Hall (part two)
page.content: Egerton Youth Club meets weekly except during the summer months and uses the Hall and adjoining Games Barn for its activities. The Hall is used as a Polling Station for Local and Parliamentary Elections. The Parish Council meets monthly. The adjoining Games Barn was erected by a joint local effort in 1965 to meet the needs of an expanding Youth Club. The Hall is available for dances, private parties and wedding receptions, and is licensed for music and dancing. Other uses are for fund raising events for local organisations and charities, and by the Blood Transfusion Service as a centre for donors.
